1.3.name: wordpress/lesson-plan-book
1.3.description: Ideal for teachers, professors, and instructors of all types of courses! Share your detailed lesson plans with others on your WordPress site or blog. Based off of the popular calendar plugin, our lesson plan book allows you to plan for multiple classes, courses, or subjects. List relevant links and attach files for users to download. Parents and students love this plugin to keep up with the daily activities in a class - especially useful for absent students!
